CSSGradient.summary: The <gradient> CSS data type is a special type of {{cssxref("<image>")}} that consists of a progressive transition between two or more colors.

remarks.para: A CSS gradient has no intrinsic dimensions; i.e., it has no natural or preferred size, nor a preferred ratio. Its concrete size will match the size of the element to which it applies.
